document.heading: Private Vehicle-for-Hire Operator Clarification Temporary Amendment Act of 2025
To amend, on an temporary basis, the Department of For-Hire Vehicles Establishment Act of 1985 to clarify the definition of a private vehicle-for-hire operator.
document.text: BE IT ENACTED BY THE COUNCIL OF THE DISTRICT OF COLUMBIA, That this act may be cited as the "Private Vehicle-for-Hire Operator Clarification Temporary Amendment Act of 2025".

section.text: Section 4(16C) of the Department of For-Hire Vehicles Establishment Act of 1985, effective March 25, 1986 (D.C. Law 6-97; D.C. Official Code ยง 50-301.03(16C)), is amended to read as follows:

para.text: "Private vehicle-for-hire operator" means an individual who utilizes the digital dispatch of a private vehicle-for-hire company to operate a motor vehicle to provide transportation to passengers.

section.heading: Applicability.
section.text: This act shall apply as of March 1, 2024.

section.heading: Fiscal impact statement.
section.text: The Council adopts the fiscal impact statement of the Budget Director as the fiscal impact statement required by section 4a of the General Legislative Procedures Act of 1975, approved October 16, 2006 (120 Stat. 2038; D.C. Official Code ยง 1-301.47a).

para.text: This act shall take effect following approval by the Mayor (or in the event of veto by the Mayor, action by the Council to override the veto) and a 30-day period of congressional review as provided in section 602(c)(1) of the District of Columbia Home Rule Act, approved December 24, 1973 (87 Stat. 813; D.C. Official Code ยง 1-206.02(c)(1)).
This act shall expire after 225 days of its having taken effect.
